text: Ani jara tumhi striyanna yapurvi talaka dyala ki tumhi tyanna hata lavala asela ani tumhi tyanca maharahi niscita kela asela tara maga tharalelya maharaci nim'mi rakkama (mahara) dya, ata tine svatahca mapha kele tara gosta vegali kinva tya manasane mapha karave jyacya hati nikahace bandhana ahe. Tumace he mapha karane takava (allahace bhaya rakhanya) si agadi javalace ahe. Ani ekamekancya pratisthela visaru naka. Nihsansaya, allaha tumacya pratyeka karmala pahata ahe
